item.description: BEACH BBQ at Pat Huff's fantastic new beach cottage on the water in Groton starting at 2 pm. You can go for a swim at a nearby beach or bring your canoe or kayak for a ride in the water. For the BBQ, bring a salad, entree, or dessert to share. Admission $10. If you don't want to bring food, cost $15. To reserve, call Gail in Bristol 860-582-8229 or Old Lyme 860-434-6426.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Beach BBQ
